text:
Chapter Lead | ING Bank | RELOCATION & VISA supported | ONSITE in Amsterdam (the Netherlands).

This IT department adopted the Spotify organization model and is looking for chapter leads (60% hands-on technical, 40% leading/managing other developers). Tech stack is diverse but for back-end we're mostly looking for Java and Scala experience. Bonus points for Cassandra experience. CI/CD knowledge is beneficial. Agile mindset a necessity.

We can support relocation & visa.For more info, contact jan.bernhart@ing.nl
